about_the_game:
Motherless - Season 2: Chapter 12 includes: Chapter 12 first and second half

  • Chapter 12 is composed of 17 extra scenes with many special images, sexy scenes, and more!
  • Get access to a new feature that enables you to change the season you want to play, just press start and continue where Season 1 left.
  • Add more beautiful women to your harem!



The story picks up right after the plane takes off to Italy, where a tired Sunny heads to the bedroom... just to be surprised by an unexpected guest!

  • Meet Giacomo's family and untangle the secrets of the Italian royalty.

  • Get to know more about Natassja's life before moving to L.A.

content_descriptors.notes:
MOTHERLESS is a Visual Novel (VN) for adults with explicit sex scenes. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

The game graphically depicts alcohol, the use of violence and drug references. If you are easily offended, this one is not for you.

All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Motherless - Season 2: Chapter 12 includes: Chapter 12 first and second half

  • Chapter 12 is composed of 17 extra scenes with many special images, sexy scenes, and more!
  • Get access to a new feature that enables you to change the season you want to play, just press start and continue where Season 1 left.
  • Add more beautiful women to your harem!



The story picks up right after the plane takes off to Italy, where a tired Sunny heads to the bedroom... just to be surprised by an unexpected guest!

  • Meet Giacomo's family and untangle the secrets of the Italian royalty.

  • Get to know more about Natassja's life before moving to L.A.
name: Motherless - Season 2: Chapter 12 DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The story picks up right after the plane takes off to Italy, where a tired Sunny heads to the bedroom... just to be surprised by an unexpected guest!INCLUDES: CHAPTER 12 (PART 1 AND PART 2)
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
